entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 except southeast 50 gusting to 70 over southern sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:19 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
